※友人との諸事情で、主にPS4版でプレイ
一言でいうとホラー映画体験ツールとしておすすめです。
基本的にPT推奨
野良でもある程度は楽しめるけど、カジュアル層も取り込んでいる為
煽りを煽りと認識していない人多数なので不快な目に合います。(このゲームに限った事ではないが）
ランダム生成マップは新鮮さを与えてくれるし、多数作品とコラボして殺人鬼と鬼ごっこできる唯一無二のゲーム
ゲームバランスはお世辞にも良いとは言えないが、１VS４に完璧なバランスを求めるのは無理な気がするので
運営には全体的にアッパー調整をお願いしたい

以下問題点
・吊りシステム、吊られている間なーんもする事ないのでゲームに非ず
何かしらアクション追加か廃止にして欲しい
・バグ
色々統制取れてないので一から作り直した方がいいのでは？
・マッチング
新規が絶対欲しいカジュアルマッチがない
プライベートマッチはあるが５人揃えないと不可なので敷居が高い

最後にまとめると
ネット記事にも出ていたが正にホラゲー界のスマブラ
現状欠陥があるが、頻繁アプデは好感触
問題点やゲート・発電機システムの見直し、演出強化してアクション追加、カジュアルマッチング実装すれば素晴らしい作品になると思う

牛逼

Played about 15-20 matches on new "Skill" Based Match-Making system. Not one match was even close. Having a teammate with shitty MMR means they will most likely leave because they do not understand what is happening when there is a good killer. The same is true the other way, been on really good teams and the killer literally gets 0 hooks or kills.

It balances all of the survivors MMRs together, so it will FOR SURE always be skewed. The delta between survivor skill is way too high. Its less skill based now and more random. Also the tier that you are currently in has nothing to do with your MMR, it is just reward based. Which is "okay", I guess, it now more or less tracks progression to BP rewards, but now players have NO VISIBLE OR TRACKABLE WAY to see how good they are. This means no one really cares anymore and good luck actually getting good at the game if every game is a wash.

It's just a grind to the top because you cannot fall down in reward rank at all. All the points are made up and the matches don't matter. So people feel nothing when they just leave and nothing bad really happens anyway. They also really have no incentive of doing well either, because doing bad has no consequence. Having a competitive game with no competitive rating is worse than participation trophies because no one is even participating nor are they getting anything for it. If you successfully grind all the way up, you get bloodpoints, which they hand out to you for playing at all anyway to try to keep you around. Grind for like 20 hours to get top rank and receive like 1 million BP, but if you play during any event for like 5 matches you get that anyway. 

Used to really enjoy this game, might check in every few months to see if matchmaking ever actually starts happening. Until then, hard pass this game unless you have a group of 4, or really like grinding mindlessly. Considering the avg gamer games about 1.5 hours a day, you might get into and finish 1 good match in that time. Maybe? Its a gamble. So just not currently worth it in my opinion.

Best game EVER!! I really love this game, there are so many variables to the game play and ALWAYSSSSS something new to learn! It's a lot to take in at first and it takes PRACTICE....So don't give up on this game!! Sometimes you get a crappy match or a few crappy matches but it gets better and it's TOTALLY WORTH IT!!!! BUY IT! OWN ALL OF THE STUFFFFFFFF!!!!! GET ON THE GRINDDDD..... LET'S GOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!! <3 <3<3

The game has been on a steady decline since the implementation of SBMM (Skill-Based Match Making), The Developers Almo and Patrick have genuinely no idea what they are talking about when it comes to the game they work on, Since they disbanded The Fog Whispers their true colors came to light about how much they actually care about the game considering Fog Whispers were under very close watch to not talk negatively whether good or bad criticism, Its player base is going down by the thousands is for good reason and they REFUSE to give up on SBMM even when its obvious heavily impacted the games growth. This game isn't fun even when winning or losing its a lose lose. The Test-Server is USELESS because again no criticism is used in any manner, The test-server is strictly to show players whats coming and no changes to be made whether its better for the patch coming. Overall play this game when you have literally nothing else to play or if you hate yourself, The Dev Matthew was on to something when he told everyone that doesn't enjoy the game to go play Civilization instead. Take his advice trust me. Look into the state of the game before buying and if you want to anyway i hope you have fun.

If I made a game this bad my family would disown me and I honestly wouldn't blame them. This game is so pathetically lazy, the developers are a bunch of clowns who wouldn't be able to make a good game if their lives depended on it. This game should be studied in game design classes because my god it's awful. Dead by Daylight isn't scary in the least bit. The gameplay is extremely repetitive and just plain dumb, and if you're new and want to play as the killer god help you, it can feel like its survivor sided which in the past years it was, now not so much. However it still feels quite annoying to play as either role and not rank up or get a "win" due to the other role not chasing. I honestly feel as if the developers look at Blizzard Entertainment and think that repetitive, boring, unbalanced gameplay is a good feature to have in games. In fact the only difference I see between them is that one hasn't assaulted their employees yet.

Sure, this game can have it's up and downs with how bad the hit-boxes are and community can be. Even with those issues, if you play the right way and have friends for survive with friends or kill your friends, it can be fun. Coming from someone who has 800 hrs, I can definitely say that it can be fun.

I've played many games in my life, but none of them left me feeling so horrible. A large chunk of the playerbase plays just to torment others in ways transcending the game. They will do anything they can in a match with a sole purpose of making you miserable and then throw insults and mock you after the match. If you abide by their "rules" and play nice, you will likely loose and they will flame you anyway. 

Both survivor and killer players are stuck in a gameplay loop that is inherently unfun for both sides in higher levels of play -it's the most "optimal", but also just boring and frustrating for everyone. Many perks are greatly unbalanced, dominating the game. As killer you will feel absolutely powerless and helpless while survivors dance in front of you and mock you. As survivor, you will get targetted by frustrated killers and tunneled out of the game early. 

It's a vicious cycle of hatred, "us vs them" mentality and frustration. Many people call themselves toxic and wear it as a badge of honour, acting accordingly. The devs have a history of not acknowledging the state of the community and leaving features (and exploits) in the game that are there specifically to bully players and have nothing to do with actual gameplay. They even told people having issues to play another game in one of their past streams. Therefore, it's unlikely it will ever get better. This issue extends to accessibility issues, as there are macroes people use purely to annoy others, that cause rapidly flashing lights and a persisting drilling sound, that may cause severe headaches or even seizures in photosensitive people.

Poor understanding of the high levels of play by the devs results in highly questionable balance. That, combined with the aforementioned overwhelming toxicity has caused the game to hemorrhage players over the last years. 

Another issue that the game has had for about 2 years now, is an overwhelming amount of hackers. Getting hacks is easy and many people use them. Many of those hacks are subtle enough that you won't know for sure if it's hacking or they are just lucky or good (especially since you don't always see what they are doing). If you caught them redhanded, they will gaslight you and tell you you are the problem instead. The hacks range from simple things like faster movement, repair speed and automated perfect dodge, to wild things like teleports, instant repair/totem cleanse, freezing the killer in an action they can't cancel or preventing the match to ever end for you even after a timer, forcing you to disconnect (which removes all your points, challenge progress and applies a timed matchmaking ban). They have also been shown capable of digging out your IP address through the game. Some streamers were even swatted due to that. These issues haven't been addressed at all by the devs and continue to exist untouched.

The core gameplay is addicting in its own way and will keep bringing you back. Then you will have a horrible experience and leave the game. And come back after forgetting how bad it was. 

I've defended this game for years, even recommended it to friends cause it has fun things about it. The characters are incredibly well designed, the art department in general is phenomenal. There are also many horror icons that are cool to experience in a game. The core gameplay is fun until you reach high levels of play and there are many killers - each with their own unique gameplay style. The lore has been expanded over time and by now it's rich and well written - a real treat for those who care. However, the toxicity and gameplay has been getting worse and worse over the years and at this point, the state of it is so fundamentally rotten, that even the associated content creators of the game struggle to have fun playing it (especially killer mains). 

To sum it up - the game can be really entertaining early on, but don't fall for that. You will end up having a horrible time and if you get too involved in the game, it will be hard to stop playing for good. You will always come back and have a bad time again. It's going downhill in terms of balance, community health and even security. Until these issues are properly addressed and proper steps are taken, I can't recommend this game to anyone. And sadly, with how long it's been going, I don't see them being addressed in neither near nor far future.

Al día de escribir esta reseña, el juego base, que trae 5 asesinos y 7 supervivientes, vale $999.00 ARS un precio extremadamente caro. Antes cuando el juego base estaba a $224.00 ARS (si, antes el juego base costaba menos que un DLC) podía ser una buena opción de compra ya sea para jugar con amigos o en solitario, pero actualmente no vale ese precio mucho menos si quieres conseguir todos los asesinos y supervivientes que, si bien puedes conseguir con la moneda del juego que te dan al ganar experiencia, los asesinos bajo licencia (Leatherface, Michael Myers, Freddy Krueger, Ash, Pinhead, etc) si o si tendrás que gastar dinero para conseguirlo.
Otro aspecto es la jugabilidad y el emparejamiento en las partidas, ambos bastante cuestionables debido a que si bien puedes aprender trucos o técnicas para mejorar, dependes mucho del equipo con el que te toque jugar, tanto como superviviente como asesino ya que:
Como superviviente:
Te puede tocar un equipo tan malo que la partida dure 3 segundos o un equipo tan bueno (considerando bueno a reparar todos los generadores) que la partida se torne aburrida.
Sin mencionar a los supervivientes que no te ayudan o te abandonan a morir en el gancho para seguir reparando.
Como asesino:
Si bien puede parecer que las mismas reglas que superviviente se pueden aplicar al asesino, refiriéndose a las 2 primeras, hay un factor extra que modifica por completo todo y ese es los supervivientes comunicados por chat de voz. Al permitirte jugar con amigos en steam puedes activar el micrófono y estar en permanente comunicación con tus compañeros.Esto, que del lado del superviviente es increíble, del lado del asesino es horrible porque poseen un control de mapa superior al tuyo, te tienen localizado todo el tiempo, se pueden dividir las tareas (por ejemplo uno distrae al asesino, otro busca el maleficio y el resto repara) colocándose perks para cada una e incluso hacer sinergia entre perks.

En síntesis si quieres jugar como superviviente es mejor con amigos o conocidos con los que te puedas comunicar, si quieres jugar como asesino te deseo suerte, pero insisto el juego no vale el precio que tiene.
Fun and enjoyable to play with friends or solo.

Depois de horas de jogo posso te dizer q não vale a pena o estresse, se você quer jogar com amigos, ótimo vc vai se divertir, se vc quer jogar de assassino, desista vc só vai se estressar, 4 dead hards todas as partidas, mapas que só te botam em desvantagem, comunicação e lag switch, não vale a pena.

You can listen to all the negative reviews if you'd like, however, this is actually a really good and very fun game assuming you learn to not get affected by the actions of the other players or fall into the "game bad" hivemind. I understand all the complaints but i have to disagree that they should make you avoid buying. 

 Killers can camp or tunnel you and ruin your experience for one game by essentially killing you entirely right away, now you either let this affect you to the point making a 3 paragraph post explaining why killer is too overpowered and campers should be banned or.....      you just find another match and keep having fun. 

 Survivors can bm harder than an MW2 lobby via teabagging, bullying, and flashlight clicking making your life a living hell and causing you to want to blast a hole through your monitor the size of a small dog. Again you will be tasked with making the decision, forum post about how SWF shouldn't exist, killer is too weak, gen rushing is too powerful, or.....    you just find another match and keep having fun. 

I'm a firm believer that the fun in a game is what you make of it. Seriously its not a competitive game, I used to experience the tilt hardcore more than pretty much any other game. I used to freak out, read posts agreeing with my poor takes on game balance to make me feel more justified, and complain to everyone about how unfair it felt. But then I realized that was dumb, and that I was being dumb. If you get camped first hook and die in 3 minutes of the match start, so be it, don't let it get to you, it doesn't happen very often and you can go into the next game hoping that you both play better and have a better experience. Same goes for killer, don't allow the people in this game and this community to keep you from playing this just due to their attitudes and overall negative behaviors and mindsets that have been formed over the lifespan of this game. No, whatever you lost to (probably) isn't actually that overpowered, yes, you probably could've outplayed your enemy, no, the way that dude played isn't a bannable offense, and no, you shouldn't judge this individuals personality and life experience or skills purely off of how they played a character in a video game.

TLDR: It's good, just stay positive and don't let the negativity get to you, its just a game, have fun.

This game is very fun

Not my cup of tea, but I see why some people like it

Positives: Decently fun gameplay loop, bunch of ways to play, regular content updates, killers are pretty fun, you feel really good when you outplay someone

Negatives: Some animations and hitboxes are really jank, a lot of toxic people play the game, better have good ping otherwise you'll get hit through walls, and some killers have mechanics that make you bash your head against the wall. 

Feels like every new killer has some re-hashed gimmick which is rather disappointing, but the killers designs are cool, and licensed killers are always fun to see.

One thing I can give towards this game is custom lobbies are fun, playing with 4 other friends is the only time I ever see myself coming back to this game.

[h1]매력적이지만 고이기너무 힘든게임[/h1]

이제 겨우적응한 뉴비다.
대회,방송보고 살려는사람,스릴러영화팬,술래잡기좋아하는사람 으로써 입문할려는사람은
아는사람 4~5명이서 하는 파티게임으로써는 추천하지만
(4~5명이서 아는사람끼리할거면 아래있는 이야기 싹다무시해도댐)

혼자 외로히하는 독고다이들은 안오는걸 권장한다.

이게임은 입문한지 얼마안대는사람으로써 이게임은 뉴비진입장벽이 매우크고 밸런스는 매우 씹창나있다.

생존자든 살인마든 처음 시작하면 주어지는 블포보상으로는 절때 대중적인 퍽을 다들수없다.
대중적인 퍽을 맞출라면 이벤트없이 최소 100시간은 갈아야하며 그과정에서 이미 뉴비로써 감당이 안대는 불가항력때매 꼬접각이 마려울것이다.

밸런스는 데바데가 실력격차가 너무심한데 숙련자층 위주에 맞춰저 거의 뉴비죽이기식 패치에 맞춰지기때문에
상대가 잘하내 쌔내가 아닌 불가항력일정도에 말도안대는 격차때문에
내가 숙련자층이 대기전까지 재밌어하는나보다 화가나있는 나를 더많이보게댄다.

어지간한 멘탈로 이게임을 입문하는건 비추천한다.
살인마가 이번 사다코콜라보까지해서 27개나 대는대 정작 게임내내 나오는건 매력도없는 오버밸런스 너스,블라이트 뿐이고
그렇다고 내가 좋아하는 핀헤드,원령,네메시스 이런걸하면 너스,블라이트때문에 생긴 간접하향(생존자 좋은퍽,킬러너프)때문에 생존자한태 아무것도못하고 쳐발리는 불상사가 일어난다.

대체제가 없어서 이겜을하지만 대체제가 생기면 바로버려질게임이다.
